title: The Spring River Flows East, Part 2: The Dawn

sources.title: The Spring River Flows East, Part 2: The Dawn
sources.description: Chinese Title: 一江春水向東流：天亮前後 The second part of the 1947 Chinese film The Spring River Flows East. Note that there are no English subtitles or dubbing. See Also: The Spring River Flows East, Part 1: Eight War-Torn Years
